document.full_text: dave checketts, the st. louis blues chairman, announced last week that the club was for sale, a somewhat unexpected development considering it is among the strongest home draws in the n.h.l.
document.title: blues draw fans, but now need an owner
lines_and_colors: dave checketts, the st. louis blues chairman, announced last week that the club was for sale, a somewhat unexpected development considering it is among the strongest home draws in the n.h.l.
